title: Samsung Pay's parent company corporate network compromised
text:
Samsung Pay's parent company corporate network compromised 
Published By: MacNN.com - Today 
Prior to Samsung Pay's rollout, the technology at its core may have been stolen. LoopPay, the company at the core of the technology, had its...
